title: Development Agency Act 2021 (No. 26 of 2021), hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Land Development Agency Act 2021
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Land Development Agency Act 2021 

(Dissolution Day) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited land development agency act 2021 (dissolution day) order 2022

title: Development Agency Act 2021 (No. 26 of 2021), hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. The 31st day of March 2022 is appointed to be the dissolution day of the
text_raw:
2. The 31st day of March 2022 is appointed to be the dissolution day of the 

body established by the Order of 2018. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 March, 2022. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 1st April, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [144] 3
text_norm: 2 31st day march 2022 appointed dissolution day body established order 2018 given official seal 29 march 2022 darragh brien minister housing local government heritage notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 1st april 2022 144 3

title: Development Agency Act 2021 (No. 26 of 2021), hereby order as follows:
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order dissolves the body established by the Land Development Agency 
(Establishment) Order 2018, S.I. 352/2018, as amended by S.I. 603/2018, with 
effect from 31 March 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [144]
